commands.name: az new-relic monitor create
commands.syntax:
az new-relic monitor create --monitor-name
                            --resource-group
                            [--account-creation-source {LIFTR, NEWRELIC}]
                            [--identity]
                            [--location]
                            [--new-relic-account]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--org-creation-source {LIFTR, NEWRELIC}]
                            [--plan-data]
                            [--tags]
                            [--user-info]
examples: az new-relic monitor create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --name MyNewRelicMonitor --location eastus2euap --user-info first-name="vdftzcggiref" last-name="bcsztgqovdlmzf" email-address="UserEmail@123.com" phone-number="123456" --plan-data billing-cycle="MONTHLY" effective-date='2022-10-25T15:14:33+02:00' plan-details="newrelic-pay-as-you-go-free-live@TIDgmz7xq9ge3py@PUBIDnewrelicinc1635200720692.newrelic_liftr_payg" usage-type="PAYG" --account-creation-source "LIFTR" --org-creation-source "LIFTR" --tags key6976=oaxfhf

commands.name: az new-relic monitor delete
commands.syntax:
az new-relic monitor delete --user-email
                            [--ids]
                            [--monitor-name]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--subscription]
examples: az new-relic monitor delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --user-email UserEmail@123.com

commands.name: az new-relic monitor get-billing-info
commands.summary: Get marketplace info mapped to the given monitor.
examples: az new-relic monitor get-billing-info --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az new-relic monitor get-metric-rule
examples: az new-relic monitor get-metric-rule --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --resource-group MyResourceGroup --user-email UserEmail@123.com

commands.name: az new-relic monitor get-metric-statu
examples: az new-relic monitor get-metric-statu --resource-group MyResourceGroup --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --user-email UserEmail@123.com --azure-resource-ids MyAzureResourceIds

commands.name: az new-relic monitor list-app-service
commands.summary: List the app service resources currently being monitored by the NewRelic resource.
examples: az new-relic monitor list-app-service --resource-group MyResourceGroup --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --user-email UserEmail@123.com --azure-resource-ids MyAzureResourceIds

commands.name: az new-relic monitor list-connected-partner-resource
commands.summary: List of all active deployments that are associated with the marketplace subscription linked to the given monitor.
examples: az new-relic monitor list-connected-partner-resource --resource-group MyResourceGroup --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor

commands.name: az new-relic monitor list-host
commands.summary: List the compute vm resources currently being monitored by the NewRelic resource.
examples: az new-relic monitor list-host --resource-group MyResourceGroup --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --user-email UserEmail@123.com --vm-ids MyVmIds

commands.name: az new-relic monitor list-linked-resource
commands.summary: List all Azure resources associated to the same NewRelic organization and account as the target resource.
examples: az new-relic monitor list-linked-resource --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az new-relic monitor monitored-resource
commands.summary: List the resources currently being monitored by the NewRelic monitor resource.
examples: az new-relic monitor monitored-resource --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az new-relic monitor show
examples: az new-relic monitor show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor

commands.name: az new-relic monitor switch-billing
commands.summary: Switches the billing for NewRelic monitor resource.
examples: az new-relic monitor switch-billing --monitor-name MyNewRelicMonitor --resource-group MyResourceGroup --azure-resource-id resourceId --organization-id organizationId --user-email="UserEmail@123.com" --plan-data billing-cycle="MONTHLY" effective-date='2022-10-25T15:14:33+02:00' plan-details="nr-privateofferplan03-upfront@TID5xd5yfrmr6no@PUBIDnewrelicinc-privateoffers.nr-privateoffers1" usage-type="COMMITTED"

commands.name: az new-relic monitor vm-host-payload
commands.summary: Returns the payload that needs to be passed in the request body for installing NewRelic agent on a VM.

commands.name: az new-relic monitor wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
